alert.note: Alert for Monroe Lower Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 11:49PM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lower Keys in Monroe County through 1215 AM EDT... At 1149 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fleming Key to Big Coppitt Key. Movement was west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds gust 30 to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Key West, Boca Chica Channel Bridge, Boca Chica, Fleming Key, Key Haven and Sunset Key. This includes US 1 between mile markers 0 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
